properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 07.
1. SUBMARINE UNREPORTED. SEARCH AND
   RESCUE OPERATIONS IN AREA BOUND BY
   41-00S 060-00W, 47-30S 062-30W,
   47-30S 060-07W, 40-00S 055-00W.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC
   PUERTO BELGRANO, INMARSAT-C: 470100125,
   PHONE: 5429 3248 7150, 5429 3248 7162.
2. NAVIGATION PROHIBITED IN AREA BETWEEN
   45-00S 46-50S AND 060-30W 059-00W.
3. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3720/17, 3780/17.
